CIAttributeDescription: Distorts an image by applying a glass-like texture. The raised portions of the output image are the result of applying a texture map.

inputImage.CIAttributeDescription: The image to use as an input image. For filters that also use a background image, this is the foreground image.

inputScale.CIAttributeDescription: The amount of texturing of the resulting image. The larger the value, the greater the texturing.

inputTexture.CIAttributeDescription: A texture to apply to the source image.

inputCenter.CIAttributeDescription: The x and y position to use as the center of the distortion.
